  • Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template used by eu.stratosphere.nephele.execution 
    Class and Description
    InputSplitProvider
    An input split provider can be successively queried to provide a series of InputSplit objects an AbstractInputTask is supposed to consume in the course of its execution.
  • Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template used by eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs 
    Class and Description
    InputSplit
    This interface must be implemented by all kind of input splits that can be assigned to Nephele's input vertices.
  • Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template used by eu.stratosphere.nephele.io 
    Class and Description
    AbstractInputTask
    Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job input vertex.
    AbstractInvokable
    Abstract base class for every task class in Nephele.
    AbstractOutputTask
    Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job output vertex.
    AbstractTask
    Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job task vertex.
  • Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template used by eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.library 
    Class and Description
    AbstractFileInputTask
    Specialized subtype of AbstractInputTask for tasks which are supposed to generate input from a file.
    AbstractFileOutputTask
    Specialized subtype of AbstractOutputTask for tasks which are supposed to write output to a file.

    Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job input vertex.
    AbstractInvokable
    Abstract base class for every task class in Nephele.

    Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job task vertex.
    IllegalConfigurationException
    An IllegalConfigurationException is thrown when the user has configured job vertices in a way that either conflicts with the expected usage of the respective task of the configuration of the Nephele framework.

    GenericInputSplit
    A generic input split that has only a partition number.
    IllegalConfigurationException
    An IllegalConfigurationException is thrown when the user has configured job vertices in a way that either conflicts with the expected usage of the respective task of the configuration of the Nephele framework.
    InputSplit
    This interface must be implemented by all kind of input splits that can be assigned to Nephele's input vertices.
